findings.title: UIF - Unlimited Increase Fees
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees without limit by calling the `setOperationFee` function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet. These funds have been swiped from the `swapTokensForEthAndSend` feature.

findings.title: Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `blacklistAddress` function.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees without limit.

findings.title: Contract Owner is able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet. These funds have been swiped from the `swapTokensForEthAndSend` feature.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to blacklist wallets from selling.
